description: Main application component for a Tic Tac Toe game built with React, managing game state and rendering the game board.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner of the game based on the current state of the board.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the player's click on the game board to place 'X' or 'O' and updates the game state.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to the initial configuration, clearing the board and resetting the turn.
